name: Mafia: Miami Drug Wars Level Design
name_original: Mafia: Miami Drug Wars Level Design
description: Hi, I'm Liam Pullin. This project is called Mafia: Miami Drug Wars and I created this by gaining influences from some of my favourite sources of media. Such as my favourite film Scarface and one of my favourite games Grand Theft Auto: Vice City. In this project I wanted to represent my skills within game documentation through an in-depth game design document and my level design skills and techniques that I had learnt through the research I produced throughout this project.
